title: Systematic Election infrastructure capture and manipulation - TTT Article 112
description:
Research systematic corruption pattern: Election infrastructure capture and manipulation

SOURCE: Trump Tyranny Tracker Article 112
TITLE: Authoritarianism 101: How It Happens — And How We Fight Back with Zev and Olga Session 7
URL: https://trumptyrannytracker.substack.com/p/authoritarianism-101-how-it-happens-af3

CORRUPTION PATTERN ANALYSIS:
This research priority focuses on documenting the systematic nature of election infrastructure capture and manipulation, 
moving beyond isolated incidents to reveal coordinated campaigns and institutional capture mechanisms.

KEY RESEARCH QUESTIONS:
- Which specific election infrastructure systems were targeted for capture?
- How were state and local election officials pressured or replaced?
- What coordination existed between federal and state election interference?
- Which voting technology companies were compromised or pressured?
- How were poll workers and election monitors systematically intimidated?
- What legal challenges were coordinated to enable election manipulation?

TIMELINE FOCUS:
- Document specific dates and coordination meetings
- Identify key actors and their systematic roles
- Map institutional capture progression
- Track resistance and countermeasures
- Connect to broader kleptocratic patterns

INDICATORS FROM SOURCE:
- Potential dates: To be researched
- Key actors mentioned: To be researched
